707906f-a.title: Manhattan: 2nd Avenue - 70th Street
707906f-a.text:
1- 2nd Avenue northwest corner of 70th Street, looking northwards
on Second Avenue.
2nd Avenue, west side from 69th Street, looking northwards.
P. L. Sperr  April 4, 1941
NO REPRODUCTIONS  Views 1,2

(3)

east showing W.P.A. reconstructlon work.
